content:
StructureChangedEventHandler Delegate

Definition

Represents the method implemented by the client application to handle the event raised when the UI Automation tree structure has changed.

In this Article

public delegate void StructureChangedEventHandler(object sender, StructureChangedEventArgs e);
Inheritance
Object
System.Delegate
StructureChangedEventHandler

Remarks

The following table describes the information in the event received by the delegate for different structure changes.

e.structureChangeType sender e.runtimeId
StructureChangeType The child that was added. The child that was added.
StructureChangeType The parent of the child that was removed. The child that was removed.
StructureChangeType The parent of the children that were added. The parent of the children that were added.
StructureChangeType The parent of the children that were removed. The parent of the children that were removed.
StructureChangeType The parent of the children that were invalidated. The parent of the children that were invalidated
